subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: With the trade deadline looming, Blue Jays General Manager J.P. Ricciardi said he did not anticipate any teams meeting the package of players it would take to acquire Roy Halladay.
snippet: With the trade deadline looming, Blue Jays General Manager J.P. Ricciardi said he did not anticipate any teams meeting the package of players it would take to acquire Roy Halladay.
